instructions.step 1: Place blackberries, butter, water, rosemary, sugar and vinegar in a small saucepan.
instructions.step 2: Cook over medium high heat stirring occasionally until slightly reduced.
instructions.step 3: About 10 -15 minutes.

instructions.step 5: Leave marinade to cool.
instructions.step 6: Place drumsticks in a large zip lock bag,.

instructions.step 10: When ready to cook, preheat oven to 375.

instructions.step 1: Mix first 8 ingredients together thoroughly then add salt & pepper and olive oil.
instructions.step 2: Form 8 thin patties with the meat mixture. Cut mozzarella into 1/4 inch pieces. On top of one patty, scatter 4-5 mozzarella pieces throughout the center of the meat leaving a little space between each cube. Be careful not to put cheese too close to the edges or it will leak out during grilling. Place another patty on top and seal edges together until cheese is completely buried.
instructions.step 3: Cut off the top of the red bell pepper and remove seeds and core. Then slice into 1/4 rings and brush lightly with olive oil.
instructions.step 4: Pesto Sauce:  In a dry frying pan, quickly toast the pine nuts. Should take less than 3 minutes. In a food processor, pulse basil leaves, toasted pine nuts and salt & pepper. simultaneously adding olive oil through the feed tube. Once good puree is achieved, add the mayo and pulse 2-3 more times, scraping sides to make sure its thoroughly mixed.
instructions.step 5: Cook burgers meat over low to medium heat. Be sure to coat grill with non-stick spray. Cook about 8-10 minutes on each side. Try not to flip the burger too often as it tends to crumble. If the mozzarella starts to ooze out, don''t worry... that''s a sign that your burger is almost done.
instructions.step 6: Place red pepper rings on the upper or outer edges of grill. Cook 2-3 minutes on each side. Brush olive oil on the insides of both halves of the sourdough buns and also place on the upper or outer edges of grill. Remove when lightly toasted.
instructions.step 7: Spread pesto sauce on top & bottom bun. place spinach leaves on bottom bun and place meat on top of spinach leaves. Garnish top of meat with grilled red bell pepper, fold the halves together and you have La Bella Burger!

instructions.step 1: In a medium pot on medium heat, melt butter and then place the bacon pieces into the pot.
instructions.step 2: Allow to cook for a couple of minutes and then add in the onion, thyme, and parsley.
instructions.step 3: Allow to cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently.Add in the green beans and the quartered new potatoes and then cover with water and turn the heat up until they come to a boil.
instructions.step 4: Once they start a small boil, turn the heat down to a simmer and cover.
instructions.step 5: Cook for 20 minutes covered, stirring occasionally.

title: Easy Slow Cooker Artichoke Garlic Chicken

instructions.step 1: Chop, mince and dice all veggies & spices.

instructions.step 3: Pour broth and lemon juice over mixture.
instructions.step 4: Cover and cook on low for 5 hours- You really dont need to check on this but every once and a while maybe give it a little stir.
instructions.step 5: Once chicken is cooked through, cook pasta.
instructions.step 6: Serve over pasta top with fresh shaved parmesan.

title: Vegetarian Spring Rolls With Garlic Lime Sauce

instructions.step 1: Julienne red and yellow bell pepper, carrots, jicama and Thai basil into 1/8in thin and 2 inch long strips.
instructions.step 2: Fill a round pie pan or shallow plate with warm water. Dip one rice paper, making sure both sides are soaked. Lay on a flat flour towel cloth. Wait ten seconds for the paper to soft before using.
instructions.step 3: Peel rice paper off of cloth.
instructions.step 4: Place half of one butter leaf lettuce on top. Make sure to discard the ribbing.
instructions.step 5: Add a thin layer of each vegetable and finish with a few pieces of Thai Basil.
instructions.step 6: Starting at one end, fold the edge towards the middle. Repeat with parallel side. Rotate the spring roll by 90 degrees and roll form one end to the next.
instructions.step 7: Cut each roll diagonally and place facing up on a serving platter.

Cranberry-Ginger Oatmeal With Toasted Hazelnuts
ingredients: gluten free, dairy free, lacto ovo vegetarian, and fodmap friendly

instructions.step 1: Add water, cranberries, ginger, and spices to a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. When the cranberries begin to burst, lower the heat to medium-low and add the oats, stirring occasionally until the desired consistency is reached, about 5-7 minutes. When oatmeal is cooked, remove the ginger and cinnamon stick and add salt.
instructions.step 2: Meanwhile, heat a small skillet over medium-low heat and add hazelnuts. Toast in the pan until you can smell the hazelnuts, as this means they are releasing their oils. Turn off heat and add hazelnuts to the oatmeal.

instructions.step 1: Cook up your bacon in a small frying pan over medium heat. Remove the bacon and drain off the fat, reserving about a tablespoon.
instructions.step 2: To the pan add in your garlic and pepper. Cook it up on medium heat for about two to three minutes.
instructions.step 3: Add in the green onions. Let cook for an additional minute.
instructions.step 4: Chop up your bacon and add it to the pan along with the broth. Love me some bacon.
instructions.step 5: Now add in your spices; the cajun, old bay, onion powder, garlic powder, lemon pepper, oregano, and pepper.
instructions.step 6: Allow the mixture to heat back up and then turn your heat down to medium low. Add in your lobster and allow it about three to five minutes to heat up completely.
instructions.step 7: Last up, add in your cream.
instructions.step 8: Serve your finished lobster over fresh cooked pasta with a few pinches of parmesan cheese and a sprinkle of chopped green onions over the top.

instructions.step 1: Reduce the blood orange juice and sugar to a syrupy consistency in a saucepan over a low flame.
instructions.step 2: Remove from heat.
instructions.step 3: In a seperate pitcher, combine tequila, triple sec, sweet and sour mix and blood orange reduction.
instructions.step 4: Pour 6 ounces of mixture into a shaker and shake well with ice for 20 seconds.
instructions.step 5: Pour over ice into a margarita glass.

instructions.step 1: In a medium skillet saute asparagus until tender, about 7 minutes. Set aside.
instructions.step 2: In a small bowl combine egg whites and tzatziki; stir to combine.
instructions.step 3: Spray non stick skillet with cooking spray and bring to medium heat. Pour in egg white and allow it to spread over the skillet surface. Cook until egg turns white; about 2 minutes.
instructions.step 4: Slide omelette onto a plate and place asparagus, tomatoes, green onions and feta in the middle. Fold the omelette into thirds to cover the fillings.
instructions.step 5: Serve hot with additional tzatziki. Salt and pepper to taste.

title: Stuffed mushrooms and Chow Mein noodles

instructions.step 1: Blanch the spinach in a very little water in the microwave oven for 3 minutes on MAX.
instructions.step 2: Drain and coarsely chop.
instructions.step 3: Chop mushroom stems in a blender.
instructions.step 4: Melt the butter over low heat, add the onion and cook for 1 minute.
instructions.step 5: Add chopped mushroom stems, and saut for 4-5 minutes, stirring often.
instructions.step 6: Add chopped spinach; stir well and saut 2 more minutes.
instructions.step 8: Mix and combine with a fork in a separate bowl ricotta, blue cheese, chives and pepper into a fine mixture, almost a paste.
instructions.step 9: Add chopped stalks and spinach mixture, stir and combine thoroughly.
instructions.step 10: Using a small teaspoon, place mounds of filling on the top of each mushroom cap, pressing slightly to get it down into the cavity.
instructions.step 11: Mix breadcrumbs and grated Parmesan cheese, sprinkle evenly over each mushroom.
instructions.step 12: Drizzle each filled cap with olive oil.
instructions.step 13: Place the mushroom caps on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or silicon sheet, and bake in the oven at 180C for 20 minutes or until the cheese browns a little.
instructions.step 14: Allow to cool for 5 minutes or so before serving.
instructions.step 15: Meanwhile cook the Chow Mein or rice noodles as directed on the package; drain.
instructions.step 16: Mix and combine garlic, sour cream and salt and stir into the cooked pasta.
instructions.step 17: Sprinkle with chopped parsley and served with stuffed mushrooms.

instructions.step 1: Preheat the oven to 425°F and pat the chicken dry.
instructions.step 2: Rub the chicken with olive oil, garlic, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
instructions.step 3: Stuff the cavity with lemon halves and garlic cloves.
instructions.step 4: Place chopped carrots and onion in a roasting pan and set the chicken on top.
instructions.step 5: Roast for 60 to 75 minutes, basting halfway through.
instructions.step 6: Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving.
instructions.step 7: Serve with roasted vegetables and pan juices.

instructions.step 1: Cook the penne according to package instructions.

instructions.step 5: Toss the cooked pasta with the sauce and serve warm.

instructions.step 1: Whisk honey, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, lime juice, and sesame oil in a bowl.

instructions.step 4: Season with salt and pepper and serve warm.

instructions.step 1: Preheat the oven to 375°F and line a muffin tin with paper cups.

instructions.step 5: Fold in chopped pecans and divide batter into muffin cups.

instructions.step 5: Serve immediately with crusty bread or rice.
